name: Roll for Defence
description:
Roll for Defence is a game based on the union between tower defence and pinball mechanics based on the "Roll of the Dice" theme of GMTK's GameJam 2022.

A horde of zombies is trying to invade your town. How long can you withstand their attack? Use you powerful rolling Dice to strike your enemies or activate your defence systems. Whenever you hit something, the side of the dice facing up will determine the outcome. Roll a 20 to unleash a devastating effect, roll a 1 and nothing good will happen.

The lives of your fellow townsfolk are at stake!

Controls:

Left Arrow Key: Swing with the left guardian.

Right Arrow Key: Swing with the right guardian.

Escape Key: Pause.
